title: [crash] Debug build crashes when refreshing the page
body:
## Steps to reproduce
1. Open a page, and refresh it.

### Expected behavior
The page reloads.

### Actual behavior
The app crashes.

### Device information
* Android device: Google Pixel (Android 10)
* Focus version: the debug build 8.13.1 (1191.0a1-20210705095222)

    
```
    --------- beginning of crash
2021-07-22 16:52:26.113 9173-9173/org.mozilla.focus.debug E/AndroidRuntime: FATAL EXCEPTION: main
    Process: org.mozilla.focus.debug, PID: 9173
    java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Unhandled menu item in BrowserFragment
        at org.mozilla.focus.fragment.BrowserFragment.onClick(BrowserFragment.kt:653)
        at org.mozilla.focus.menu.browser.BrowserMenuViewHolder.onClick(BrowserMenuViewHolder.java:40)
        at android.view.View.performClick(View.java:7140)
        at android.view.View.performClickInternal(View.java:7117)
        at android.view.View.access$3500(View.java:801)
        at android.view.View$PerformClick.run(View.java:27351)
        at android.os.Handler.handleCallback(Handler.java:883)
        at android.os.Handler.dispatchMessage(Handler.java:100)
        at android.os.Looper.loop(Looper.java:214)
        at android.app.ActivityThread.main(ActivityThread.java:7356)
        at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Native Method)
        at com.android.internal.os.RuntimeInit$MethodAndArgsCaller.run(RuntimeInit.java:492)
        at com.android.internal.os.ZygoteInit.main(ZygoteInit.java:930)
2021-07-22 16:52:26.115 9173-9173/org.mozilla.focus.debug E/ExceptionHandler: Uncaught exception handled: 
    java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Unhandled menu item in BrowserFragment
        at org.mozilla.focus.fragment.BrowserFragment.onClick(BrowserFragment.kt:653)
        at org.mozilla.focus.menu.browser.BrowserMenuViewHolder.onClick(BrowserMenuViewHolder.java:40)
        at android.view.View.performClick(View.java:7140)
        at android.view.View.performClickInternal(View.java:7117)
        at android.view.View.access$3500(View.java:801)
        at android.view.View$PerformClick.run(View.java:27351)
        at android.os.Handler.handleCallback(Handler.java:883)
        at android.os.Handler.dispatchMessage(Handler.java:100)
        at android.os.Looper.loop(Looper.java:214)
        at android.app.ActivityThread.main(ActivityThread.java:7356)
        at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Native Method)

2021-07-22 16:52:26.736 9173-9227/org.mozilla.focus.debug E/GeckoConsole: [JavaScript Error: "NS_ERROR_FILE_NOT_FOUND: " {file: "resource://gre/modules/SessionStoreFunctions.jsm" line: 120}]
    SSF_updateSessionStoreForWindow@resource://gre/modules/SessionStoreFunctions.jsm:120:5
```
